mapper.select: select * from board_t order by board_idx desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select * from board_t order by board_idx
mapper.insert: insert into board_t (board_title, u_nickname, content, regdate, hit, u_idx, board_pw) values (#{board_title}, #{u_nickname}, #{content}, sysdate(), 0, #{u_idx}, #{board_pw})
mapper.update: update board_t set active = 1 where board_idx = #{board_idx}
